long_description: When you need some nose and forehead protection on the go, wear the Outdoor Research Radar Visor. It offers UPF 30 sun protection and stores in your pocket with the help of the folding brim. Breathable, lightweight Supplex(R) nylon visor is great for travel; short folding brim pops back into shape when you pull it out of your pocket. Quick-release buckle closure lets you hang it from a pack and clip it under a ponytail. Polyester headband wicks moisture to keep you comfortable. Outdoor Research Radar Visor packs down small, fits men and women, and weighs only 1.8 oz. Closeout.
short_description: When you need some nose and forehead protection on the go, wear the Outdoor Research Radar Visor. It offers UPF 30 sun protection and stores in your pocket with the help of the folding brim.
